        Description copied from class: ContainerVmAllocationPolicy
        Allocates a host for a given VM. The host to be allocated is the one that was already reserved.
        Specified by:
        allocateHostForVm in class ContainerVmAllocationPolicy
        Parameters:
        containerVm - virtual machine which the host is reserved to
        Returns:
